name: Fallen Monolith
description: A massive stone monument that once marked an important location or contained powerful magic now lies broken and forgotten. The materials and potential magical properties can be extremely valuable, while the mysterious purpose and ancient power attract scholars and adventurers.
atmosphere: Massive stone monument lies broken like fallen giant with once-mighty presence now scattered across ground. Air carries ancient power, old magic, and forgotten purpose dust scent. Fingertips trace weathered surfaces that once pulsed with magical energy. Skin tingles with sense of potential magical properties and ancient power. Taste of ancient power and mysterious purpose fills mouth. Weight of fallen majesty and forgotten purpose presses down on you.
